# Andrea Thompson

 

[City Council](https://www.jacksonvilleor.us/Directory.aspx?DID=13)  
Title: Council Member  
Phone: 541-702-2475  
[Email Andrea Thompson](mailto:councilorthompson@jacksonvilleor.us)

A retired professor of American literature and Native American Studies, Andrea was elected to the Jacksonville City Council in 2020 and then re-elected in 2024. On the Council many of her efforts have been directed to pubic safety issues, especially police and fire. An advocate for public participation in local government, Andrea serves as the Council liaison for the Committee for Citizen Involvement, and represents the Council on the Technical Advisory Committee for Land Use Planning as well as the RVCOG. She currently serves as President of the Jacksonville Boosters Club.  She enjoys the beauty of Southern Oregon and spends time hiking the trails with her dogs and fishing in the lakes and rivers. She and her husband Marshall also enjoy the Britt as well as the local winery scene where Marshall frequently performs.
